title: S14 Ep41: Science Was Wrong: A Farewell To Stanton T. Friedman
itunes:title: Science Was Wrong: A Farewell To Stanton T. Friedman
description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS honors and pays respect to the late UFOlogist, Stanton Friedman.

In a weekend of memorial shows dedicated to the life of Ufologist Stanton T. Friedman, BEYOND the DARKNESS offers up an encore presentation of an interview with Stanton and his co-author, Kathleen Marden on their book, Science Was Wrong: Startling Truths About Cures, Theories, and Inventions "They" Declared Impossible.

Get the Book: www.stantonfriedman.com
